item.title: Ben & Jerry’s Co-Founder’s Resignation Proves One Thing: Selling Your Brand Affects You Forever
item.description: Jerry Greenfield, whose ice cream company expanded from a Vermont gas station to become a global brand, said he was leaving ahead of plans by Unilever...

item.title: Don’t Use This Cookware: FDA Expands List of Products That Could Be Poisoning Your Food With Lead
item.description: The health agency is warning consumers that certain brass and aluminum cookware could leach dangerous amounts of toxic metals.

item.title: How This Founder Launched a CPG Company in an Industry With No Rulebook
item.description: Ashley Sweeney shares her advice for other founders and gives a look into her just-launched brand, Realm.

item.title: Stop Calling AI Agents Your Teammates
item.description: AI agents and bots are not coworkers. They’re tools. Here’s how to actually use them to level up your real team.

item.title: Can You Cut an Interview Short If the Candidate Is Obviously Wrong for the Job?
item.description: … and two other tricky workplace dilemmas.
